dict.string: The Apple Music is used by the user to upload and listen to audio files- which are directly connected with spirituality and related topics, which are either authored by the User, and or may hold copyright the upload.

Camera is used when users wish to participate in a Live Session with other users. The camera is also used for Group Live sessions, after the user has speciffically requesd to join the group. The camera is never used without the permission and consent of users.

Microphone is used when users wish to participate in a Live Session with other users. The Microphone is also used for Group Live sessions, after the user has specifically request to join the group. The Microphone is never used without the permission and consent of users.

The Photo Library is used by the user when registering, and desiring to upload their profile photo(DP) on the platform. This photo upload is unto the user to upload a photo or an icon or any image that they desire to upload as their profile photo. Besides this usage the user can also upload eBook, Video clips and audio files- which are directly connected with spirituality and related topics, which are either authored by the User, and or may hold copyright the upload.
